<extensions defaultExtensionNs="com.intellij">
<localInspection implementationClass="com.picimako.justkitting.inspection.CallMatcherInspection"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA"/>
<localInspection groupPath="Some,Path"/>
<localInspection groupPathKey="some.path"/>
<localInspection groupName="The group name"/>
<localInspection groupKey="group.key"/>
<localInspection displayName="This is the inspection title"/>
<localInspection key="inspection.title.key"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some,Path"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupKey="group.key"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupName="The group name"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some,Path" groupName="The group name"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some,Path" groupName="The group name"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some,Path" groupName="The group name" key="inspection.title.key"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some,Path" groupName="The group name" key="inspection.title.key"/>
<localInspection language="JAVA" groupPath="Some" groupName="The group name" key="inspection.title.key" enabledByDefault="true"/>
<localInspection implementationClass="com.some.InspectionImpl" language="JAVA" groupPath="Some" groupName="The group name" key="inspection.title.key" enabledByDefault="true"/> </extensions> </idea-plugin
